history.proof: unfold ProtocolWithIndInv. destruct ii. simpl. reflexivity.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
pr: protocol
I: dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop
ii: InductiveInv pr I

Goal:
plab (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) = plab pr

Premises:
plab = Protocols.plab : Protocols.protocol -> Label
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
nid = nat : Set
InductiveInv = ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv : protocol -> (dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) -> Type Arguments InductiveInv _ _%function_scope
pred = fun T : Type => T -> bool : Type -> Type Arguments pred _%type_scope
ProtocolWithIndInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop), ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I -> Protocols.protocol
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I |- Type] ?T' : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I |- Type] ?f : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I |- ?T'] ?s : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I |- seq ?T]
FunctionalExtensionality.functional_extensionality : forall f g : ?A -> ?B, (forall x : ?A, f x = g x) -> f = g where ?A : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I |- Type] ?B : [pr : protocol I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop ii : InductiveInv pr I |- Type]
with_inv_coh : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s : state), s \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> s \In Coh (mkWorld pr)
with_inv_nodes : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (l : Label), nodes (getProtocol (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) l) = nodes (getProtocol (mkWorld pr) l)
rtIn : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I) (r : ProtocolWithInvariant.ReceiveInv p I), r \In rts ii -> rcv_transI (rt_inv (r:=r)) \In rcv_trans (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)
stIn : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I) (s : ProtocolWithInvariant.SendInv p I), s \In sts ii -> snd_transI (st_inv (s:=s)) \In snd_trans (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)
Protocols.plab = fun p : Protocols.protocol => let (nodes, plab, coh, snd_trans, rcv_trans, _, _) := p in plab : Protocols.protocol -> Label
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
ProtocolWithInvariant.SI : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (st : send_trans (coh p)), ProtocolWithInvariant.S_inv I st -> ProtocolWithInvariant.SendInv p I
cohI = fun (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) => [Pred d | coh p d /\ I d (nodes p d)] : protocol -> (dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) -> Simpl_Pred dstatelet Arguments cohI _ _%function_scope
rt : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop), ProtocolWithInvariant.ReceiveInv p I -> receive_trans (coh p)
st : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop), ProtocolWithInvariant.SendInv p I -> send_trans (coh p)
sts : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop), ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I -> seq (ProtocolWithInvariant.SendInv p I)
rts : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop), ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I -> seq (ProtocolWithInvariant.ReceiveInv p I)
cohIVs : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (d : dstatelet), cohI p I d -> valid (dsoup d)
cohIVd : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (d : dstatelet), cohI p I d -> valid (dstate d)
getInvSendTrans : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : ProtocolWithInvariant.InductiveInv p I) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) (z to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (s1 : state) (h : heap), st \In snd_trans (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> forall S : send_safe st z to (getStatelet s1 (plab p)) msg, Some h = send_step S -> exists st' : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol (mkWorld p) (plab p))), [/\ st' \In get_st (mkWorld p) (plab p), t_snd st' = t_snd st, all_hooks_fire (mkWorld p) (plab p) (t_snd st') s1 z msg to & exists S' : send_safe st' z to (getStatelet s1 (plab p)) msg, Some h = send_step S']
rcv_transI : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (rt : receive_trans (coh p)), ProtocolWithInvariant.R_inv I rt -> Transitions.receive_trans (CohI p I)
snd_transI : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (st : send_trans (coh p)), ProtocolWithInvariant.S_inv I st -> Transitions.send_trans (CohI p I)
send_stepI : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (st : send_trans (coh p)), send_step_t (send_safeI I st)
st_inv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (s : ProtocolWithInvariant.SendInv p I), ProtocolWithInvariant.S_inv I (st s)
rt_inv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (r : ProtocolWithInvariant.ReceiveInv p I), ProtocolWithInvariant.R_inv I (rt r)
cohIDom : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (d : dstatelet), cohI p I d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes p d
s_step_cohI : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (st : send_trans (coh p)), ProtocolWithInvariant.S_inv I st -> s_step_coh_t (CohI p I) (t_snd st) (send_stepI (st:=st))
s_safe_cohI : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (st : send_trans (coh p)) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safeI I st this to d m -> CohI p I d
r_step_cohI : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (rt : receive_trans (coh p)), ProtocolWithInvariant.R_inv I rt -> r_step_coh_t (fun (d : dstatelet) (C : CohI p I d) => msg_wf rt (proj1 C)) (t_rcv rt) (receive_stepI rt)
Transitions.send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
send_safeI : forall p : protocol, (dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) -> send_trans (coh p) -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
nodes = Protocols.nodes : Protocols.protocol -> dstatelet -> pred nid

```coq
unfold ProtocolWithIndInv.
destruct ii.
simpl.
reflexivity.
Qed.```

original: unfold ProtocolWithIndInv. destruct ii. simpl. reflexivity.
